project_abstract.cdata: The Third Henan Provincial Highway Project aims at providing a more efficient and effective transport infrastructure in support of social and economic development in Henan Province. To meet this development objective, the project will produce the following outputs: reduced traffic and enhanced mobility, improved access to the poor areas in the province, and increased efficiency and effectiveness in public sector management of the road network while preparing the sector for commercialization opportunities. The project has three components. The first increases capacity by constructing an expressway; linking roads to maximize the impact of the expressway; and providing buildings/services areas, traffic engineering and equipment for operations and maintenance. The second component improves or rehabilitates roads with priority given to rural road segments that explicitly enable local people to have an easier access to education, health, and other social activities and facilitates production and business operations and benefits the local environment. The third component includes three sub-components which 1) build the capacity of the communications department, and provide extensive training programs in the areas of environmental protection, construction and maintenance technology and management, highway network planning, and operations management for senior professionals; 2) supply technical assistance for studies in road management improvement; and 3) provide specialized equipment

P058844.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>第三河南公路项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目旨在建设效率更高且更有效的交通基础设施，支持河南省社会经济发展。为实现这一发展目标，本项目将产生下列产出：（1）交通流量减少，机动性增强；（2）公共部门的路网管理效率和效果提高，该部门为商业化做好准备。本项目设有三个子项目。第一个子项目将提高交通能力，为此将建设一条高速公路，建设连接道路以实现该高速公路影响最大化，修建建筑或服务区，新建交通工程，提供运行养护设备。第二个子项目将开展道路改造，重点开展农村道路改造，使当地人民更易获得教育和卫生服务及开展其它社会活动；为生产和企业运营提供便利；改善当地环境。第三个子项目包含三个二级子项目，它们将：（1）针对省交通厅开展能力建设，为高级专业人员在环境保护、施工和养护技术及管理、公路网规划以及运营管理等方面提供广泛培训；（2）针对如何改进公路管理方面的研究提供技术援助；（3）提供专门设备。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
